comments.text:
(In reply to John Hopkins (:jhopkins) from comment #0)
> What would it take for us to start running performance tests against
> Thunderbird?
> How are Firefox accomplishing this?
> 
> Let's start investigating.

<https://wiki.mozilla.org/Buildbot/Talos>

I've made a preliminary list of things to test:
1. Startup/shutdown (bug 462862)
2. Folder operations (particularly open and search)
3. Addressbook search
4. Bulk message operations
5. Complex message rendering
